plugin.name: TVGuide
plugin.summary: Get EPG data from tvguide for personal use only
plugin.description: Obtain many days of EPG data from tvguide for personal use only.  There is no data within this plugin from the provider.
plugin.changelog: - Added Default values to tool tip

plugin.name: DaddyLive
plugin.summary: Watch TV channels from daddylivehd.sx website.
plugin.description: Watch Free TV! Stream daddylivehd.sx TV's channels of news, sports, and the Internet's best, completely free.
plugin.dependencies: (optional) TVGuide provides the EPG for DaddyLive
plugin.changelog:
- Moved to new website
- Added a ton of new channels
- HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE FOLLOWING UPDATES
- Change the number of EPG days to 2
- Cleanout the daddylive entries from the database
- Run the channel scheduler for daddylive
- Edit the channels and disable all that you do not want
- Run the EPG scheduler for daddylive
- Go to the DVR/mediaserver and import the updates
- If all checks out, then slowly increase the number of EPG days

plugin.name: M3U
plugin.description: Watch Free TV! Using M3U and XMLTV formats.
plugin.changelog: - Added enable_full_duplicate_checking to instance setting. If the query_string part of the url has a token that changes every time a request for updates occurs, the result will be to re-download the packet over and over. To keep this from happening, set this to false and it will not include the query_string portion of the URL when determining whether the packet is new.

plugin.name: Cabernet
plugin.summary: Cabernet allows control of IPTV streams
plugin.description: Connect streams to your favorite media server. Cabernet is a modular-based appliance/platform that cleans, organizes and repackages IPTV streams to be compatible and digested by media clients.

plugin.name: XUMO
plugin.summary: Xumo.TV brings you the best content from digital networks
plugin.description: Xumo.TV brings you the best content from digital networks, presented just like the channels on your TV and mobile devices, only with more cool features.
plugin.changelog: - Added enable_full_duplicate_checking to instance setting. If the query_string part of the url has a token that changes every time a request for updates occurs, the result will be to re-download the packet over and over. To keep this from happening, set this to false and it will not include the query_string portion of the URL when determining whether the packet is new.

plugin.name: PlutoTV

If the query_string part of the url has a token that changes every time a request for updates occurs, the result will be to re-download the packet over and over. To keep this from happening, set this to false and it will not include the query_string portion of the URL when determining whether the packet is new.
